He and his wife, Didre, were driving home to a suburb of Lusaka in his Toyota Landcruiser when they were approached by a group of armed men. According to Didre, Kaunda told the gang: 'I am Major Wezi Kaunda. Please take my car, take whatever you want. I am not resisting. Spare my life and my wife.
